RmUtility::BoundBox Struct Reference

Specifies an upper-left and lower-right coordinates that identify a rectangular bounding box in a Cartesian coordinate system. More...

Detailed Description

Specifies an upper-left and lower-right coordinates that identify a rectangular bounding box in a Cartesian coordinate system.
